text:
Created attachment 22236
Sample Fo containing Column Break code

Version of FOP used: fop-0.94

Im unable to create column breaks in the RTF generated using the simplecol3.fo file attached to this issue.However im able to create a PDF with column breaks.
Can you please help out as I have prepare a report which has column breaks in it.
creator: sharathaku@yahoo.co.in

text: Sorry to disappoint you but multiple columns are not supported for RTF output, yet. No idea when it will be implemented. Patches are welcome. I've updated the documentation to state that limitation.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
